connector.description: Interact with ServiceNow via its REST API.

camel.sink.endpoint.display.name: camel.sink.endpoint.display
camel.sink.endpoint.display.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards where the indicator Display field is selected. Set this parameter to all to return scorecards with any Display field value. This parameter is true by default. One of: [false] [true] [all]

camel.sink.endpoint.displayValue.name: camel.sink.endpoint.displayValue
camel.sink.endpoint.displayValue.description: Return the display value (true), actual value (false), or both (all) for reference fields (default: false) One of: [false] [true] [all]

camel.sink.endpoint.excludeReferenceLink.name: camel.sink.endpoint.excludeReferenceLink
camel.sink.endpoint.excludeReferenceLink.description: True to exclude Table API links for reference fields (default: false)

camel.sink.endpoint.favorites.name: camel.sink.endpoint.favorites
camel.sink.endpoint.favorites.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards that are favorites of the querying user.

camel.sink.endpoint.includeAggregates.name: camel.sink.endpoint.includeAggregates
camel.sink.endpoint.includeAggregates.description: Set this parameter to true to always return all available aggregates for an indicator, including when an aggregate has already been applied. If a value is not specified, this parameter defaults to false and returns no aggregates.

camel.sink.endpoint.includeAvailableAggr.name: camel.sink.endpoint.includeAvailableAggregates
camel.sink.endpoint.includeAvailableAggr.description: Set this parameter to true to return all available aggregates for an indicator when no aggregate has been applied. If a value is not specified, this parameter defaults to false and returns no aggregates.

camel.sink.endpoint.includeAvailableBrea.name: camel.sink.endpoint.includeAvailableBreakdowns
camel.sink.endpoint.includeAvailableBrea.description: Set this parameter to true to return all available breakdowns for an indicator. If a value is not specified, this parameter defaults to false and returns no breakdowns.

camel.sink.endpoint.includeScoreNotes.name: camel.sink.endpoint.includeScoreNotes
camel.sink.endpoint.includeScoreNotes.description: Set this parameter to true to return all notes associated with the score. The note element contains the note text as well as the author and timestamp when the note was added.

camel.sink.endpoint.includeScores.name: camel.sink.endpoint.includeScores
camel.sink.endpoint.includeScores.description: Set this parameter to true to return all scores for a scorecard. If a value is not specified, this parameter defaults to false and returns only the most recent score value.

camel.sink.endpoint.inputDisplayValue.name: camel.sink.endpoint.inputDisplayValue
camel.sink.endpoint.inputDisplayValue.description: True to set raw value of input fields (default: false)

camel.sink.endpoint.key.name: camel.sink.endpoint.key
camel.sink.endpoint.key.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards for key indicators.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.models.name: camel.sink.endpoint.models
camel.sink.endpoint.models.description: Defines both request and response models

camel.sink.endpoint.perPage.name: camel.sink.endpoint.perPage
camel.sink.endpoint.perPage.description: Enter the maximum number of scorecards each query can return. By default this value is 10, and the maximum is 100.

camel.sink.endpoint.release.name: camel.sink.endpoint.release
camel.sink.endpoint.release.description: The ServiceNow release to target, default to Helsinki See https://docs.servicenow.com One of: [FUJI] [GENEVA] [HELSINKI]

camel.sink.endpoint.resource.name: camel.sink.endpoint.resource
camel.sink.endpoint.resource.description: The default resource, can be overridden by header CamelServiceNowResource

camel.sink.endpoint.sortBy.name: camel.sink.endpoint.sortBy
camel.sink.endpoint.sortBy.description: Specify the value to use when sorting results. By default, queries sort records by value. One of: [value] [change] [changeperc] [gap] [gapperc] [duedate] [name] [order] [default] [group] [indicator_group] [frequency] [target] [date] [trend] [bullet] [direction]

camel.sink.endpoint.sortDir.name: camel.sink.endpoint.sortDir
camel.sink.endpoint.sortDir.description: Specify the sort direction, ascending or descending. By default, queries sort records in descending order. Use sysparm_sortdir=asc to sort in ascending order. One of: [asc] [desc]

camel.sink.endpoint.suppressAutoSysField.name: camel.sink.endpoint.suppressAutoSysField
camel.sink.endpoint.suppressAutoSysField.description: True to suppress auto generation of system fields (default: false)

camel.sink.endpoint.suppressPaginationHe.name: camel.sink.endpoint.suppressPaginationHeader
camel.sink.endpoint.suppressPaginationHe.description: Set this value to true to remove the Link header from the response. The Link header allows you to request additional pages of data when the number of records matching your query exceeds the query limit

camel.sink.endpoint.table.name: camel.sink.endpoint.table
camel.sink.endpoint.table.description: The default table, can be overridden by header CamelServiceNowTable

camel.sink.endpoint.target.name: camel.sink.endpoint.target
camel.sink.endpoint.target.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards that have a target.

camel.sink.endpoint.topLevelOnly.name: camel.sink.endpoint.topLevelOnly
camel.sink.endpoint.topLevelOnly.description: Gets only those categories whose parent is a catalog.

camel.sink.endpoint.apiVersion.name: camel.sink.endpoint.apiVersion
camel.sink.endpoint.apiVersion.description: The ServiceNow REST API version, default latest

camel.sink.endpoint.dateFormat.name: camel.sink.endpoint.dateFormat
camel.sink.endpoint.dateFormat.description: The date format used for Json serialization/deserialization

camel.sink.endpoint.dateTimeFormat.name: camel.sink.endpoint.dateTimeFormat
camel.sink.endpoint.dateTimeFormat.description: The date-time format used for Json serialization/deserialization

camel.sink.endpoint.mapper.name: camel.sink.endpoint.mapper
camel.sink.endpoint.mapper.description: Sets Jackson's ObjectMapper to use for request/reply

camel.sink.endpoint.retrieveTargetRecord.name: camel.sink.endpoint.retrieveTargetRecordOnImport
camel.sink.endpoint.retrieveTargetRecord.description: Set this parameter to true to retrieve the target record when using import set api. The import set result is then replaced by the target record

camel.sink.endpoint.timeFormat.name: camel.sink.endpoint.timeFormat
camel.sink.endpoint.timeFormat.description: The time format used for Json serialization/deserialization

camel.sink.endpoint.password.name: camel.sink.endpoint.password
camel.sink.endpoint.password.description: ServiceNow account password, MUST be provided

camel.sink.endpoint.sslContextParameters.name: camel.sink.endpoint.sslContextParameters
camel.sink.endpoint.sslContextParameters.description: To configure security using SSLContextParameters. See http://camel.apache.org/camel-configuration-utilities.html

camel.sink.endpoint.userName.name: camel.sink.endpoint.userName
camel.sink.endpoint.userName.description: ServiceNow user account name, MUST be provided

camel.component.servicenow.inputDisplayV.name: camel.component.servicenow.inputDisplayValue
camel.component.servicenow.inputDisplayV.description: True to set raw value of input fields (default: false)

camel.component.servicenow.key.description: Set this parameter to true to return only scorecards for key indicators.

camel.component.servicenow.models.name: camel.component.servicenow.models
camel.component.servicenow.models.description: Defines both request and response models

camel.component.servicenow.perPage.name: camel.component.servicenow.perPage
camel.component.servicenow.perPage.description: Enter the maximum number of scorecards each query can return. By default this value is 10, and the maximum is 100.

camel.component.servicenow.release.name: camel.component.servicenow.release
camel.component.servicenow.release.description: The ServiceNow release to target, default to Helsinki See https://docs.servicenow.com One of: [FUJI] [GENEVA] [HELSINKI]

camel.component.servicenow.resource.description: The default resource, can be overridden by header CamelServiceNowResource

camel.component.servicenow.suppressAutoS.name: camel.component.servicenow.suppressAutoSysField
camel.component.servicenow.suppressAutoS.description: True to suppress auto generation of system fields (default: false)

camel.component.servicenow.suppressPagin.name: camel.component.servicenow.suppressPaginationHeader

camel.component.servicenow.topLevelOnly.name: camel.component.servicenow.topLevelOnly

camel.component.servicenow.apiVersion.name: camel.component.servicenow.apiVersion
camel.component.servicenow.apiVersion.description: The ServiceNow REST API version, default latest

camel.component.servicenow.autowiredEnab.name: camel.component.servicenow.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.servicenow.autowiredEnab.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.servicenow.dateFormat.name: camel.component.servicenow.dateFormat
camel.component.servicenow.dateFormat.description: The date format used for Json serialization/deserialization

camel.component.servicenow.dateTimeForma.name: camel.component.servicenow.dateTimeFormat
camel.component.servicenow.dateTimeForma.description: The date-time format used for Json serialization/deserialization

camel.component.servicenow.mapper.name: camel.component.servicenow.mapper
camel.component.servicenow.mapper.description: Sets Jackson's ObjectMapper to use for request/reply

camel.component.servicenow.userName.description: ServiceNow user account name, MUST be provided
